name: All Pigs Deserve to Burn in Hell
name_original: All Pigs Deserve to Burn in Hell
description: Main character (whose name we never get to know) wakes up one day in form of a pig. Once he leaves his warm house, he is confronted by a different world. On his journey to investigate the chaotic happenings around him he comes across the true meaning of it. No, it is not a dream.
